name: Munyaradzi Muchafuruka
desc: A passionate full-stack developer and web designer with  experience, currently based in Zimbabwe.
aboutDesc: Munyaradzi is a versatile developer skilled in both front-end and back-end technologies. With a strong foundation in JavaScript, React, Node.js, and database management, he brings creative solutions to complex problems. His journey spans across continents, blending technical expertise with a global perspective.
